column1: She wakes up every morning at 5 a.m. to train for the marathon.
Despite the long hours and low pay, he continually seeks opportunities to advance in his career.
Their dream of opening a small bakery finally turned into reality after years of saving.
He talked about becoming an astronaut, but he never took the steps to pursue it.
After graduation, she aimed to become a leading scientist in renewable energy.
You can see the drive in her eyes when she speaks of her future plans.
He often daydreams about writing a novel, but never begins the first chapter.
The artist worked tirelessly on his paintings, hoping to get featured in a major gallery.
She bought a planner to map out her goals and stick to them.
He struggled with motivation and couldn't find the drive to complete his assignments.
You didn't give up, even when every door seemed to close on you.
She has a five-year plan outlined with meticulous detail. X
Despite threats and criticisms, she continues to fight for environmental justice.
The lack of enthusiasm for his job began to affect his performance. X
We launched a startup in our garage, fueled by dreams of innovation.
He always talked about quitting his job but never sent out a single resume.
She put in extra hours at the gym, focused on winning the national championship.
You meticulously prepare for every meeting, knowing that leadership notices hard work.
He's content with his current position and isn't interested in climbing the career ladder.
When they decided to build their own house, they didn't let inexperience hold them back.
The student's goal was to learn a new language by the end of the academic year.
She doesn't hesitate to go the extra mile, even if it means sacrificing her weekends.
He drifted from one job to another, never settling for long-term growth.
I set a reminder every morning to meditate and focus on my personal growth.
He hopes to become a chef and is constantly experimenting with new recipes.
She finished her degree while caring for her newborn, showing her unstoppable spirit.
He never missed a practice session, aiming to make it to the professional league.
You keep signing up for classes that push you out of your comfort zone.
He repeatedly declined promotions, content with his daily routine without change.
She seeks to make a mark in the tech industry, working on groundbreaking projects.
He loves the idea of starting a podcast but hasn't researched what it takes.
I plan to run a charity marathon to raise funds for children's education.
He strived to be the top salesman of the year, putting in extra effort every day.
Without a clear path, she moves from one temporary job to the next.
The band worked tirelessly on their album, hoping to reach a wider audience.
You always follow up on feedback, improving with each iteration.
She moved across the country to take a job that aligned with her career goals.
He's passionate about tech but isn't willing to learn the new skills required.
I stayed late at the office, preparing for the project presentation.
They envisioned a future where their non-profit could help thousands of people.
Despite rejections, she kept sending out applications to her dream companies.
He had grand ideas but lacked the persistence to bring any to fruition.
You finish every book you start, making notes on how to implement ideas in your life.
The scientist spent years in research, hoping to find a cure for a rare disease.
She's always eager to volunteer, knowing that it leads to personal and professional growth.
He preferred to spend evenings watching TV rather than working on self-improvement.
I started a savings plan to travel the world, visiting every continent by age 30.
They attended every industry conference, networking with potential investors for their startup.
You committed to reading one book a week to broaden your knowledge.
Despite failing numerous times, he believed in his startup idea and persevered.
